duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess communication disorders using accepted tests and measurements.
Manage student behaviors and provide recommendations to educators and parents.
Plan and deliver purposeful therapy to close gaps in communication and academic skills.
Analyze data to intervene and adjust therapy, seeking excellence as an educator.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Communication Disorders from an accredited college or university
Valid Texas license as a Speech Language Pathologist granted by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation
National Certification of Clinical Competence granted by the American Speech Language Hearing Association (ASHA)
